alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 10:57AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, southeastern Gallia, Mason and west central Jackson Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1056 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gallipolis, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Racine, New Haven, Mason, Middleport, Syracuse, Hartford City, Henderson, Leon, Cheshire, Mount Alto, Lakin, Cottageville, Gallopolis Ferry, Evans and Letart. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 135 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
